data.strFullDescription:
First of all , This is Classic Edition ! Online is not supported!

PICO PARK:Classic Edition is a cooperative local multiplay action puzzle game for 2-10 players.

If you want to play online, you should definitely consider this one.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1509960/PICO_PARK

Each level of PICO PARK can be cleared when players get the key, unlock the door and all players reach it.

But, every level requires cooperation to complete..
For example, players can climb on top of each other to reach new heights, or they can combine their strength to push large blocks.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/461040/extras/ed0e0fc8733f2d245fd441e1091214cd.avif?t=1740033165[/img]

PICO PARK is very flexible because every level adjusts to the total number of players.
So you can play with as many friends as your like..

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/461040/extras/f5c0b0d8a2e59aae59cf2b4081c2f193.avif?t=1740033165[/img]
2 players game

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/461040/extras/14d512dec07be369d979121a68ab1d24.avif?t=1740033165[/img]
6 players game

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/461040/extras/e53d83540c31b1b96198d49c28b809d2.avif?t=1740033165[/img]
10 players game

and you can control PICO PARK with your iPhone/iPad/Android.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/461040/extras/490bb9c42bdc81a92fd33ba286583b67.avif?t=1740033165[/img]
TecoGamePad change your smartphone turn to gamepad
Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=toybox.app.teco_game_pad
iOS:[url]itunes.apple.com/us/app/tecogamepad/id1080510485[/url]

Let's have fun playing PICO PARK with your friends!
data.strSnippet: PICO PARK:Classic Edition is a cooperative local multiplay action puzzle game for 2-10 players.
